options: 30 cm on the same side as the object
30 cm on the opposite side of the object
6 cm on the same side as the object
6 cm on the opposite side of the object
questions.answer_value: 30 cm on the opposite side of the object

options: The angle of incidence is equal to the angle of reflection.
The speed of light is constant.

questions.answer_value: The angle of incidence is equal to the angle of reflection.

options: Energy can be created at will.

questions.answer_value: Energy can neither be created nor destroyed.

the magnet is moved away from the stationary solenoid
the solenoid is moved away from the stationary magnet
questions.question_value: there is no relative motion
